comment.author: 79702527@N06
comment._content: Hello...You may know this already, but I noticed the name J.D. Reymert bottom left on the card. That must be John DeNoon Reymert, Norwegian-American newspaper editor from Farsund?? First man who founded a Norwegian language newspaper in the United States. Here is link to Wikipedia: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/James_DeNoon_Reymert Thank you for amazing pictures:)
